entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near mainland valleys and inlets early this morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 04 March 2023
